content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #142

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: The Query for Current Context is only executed in active contexts?

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Query for Current Context
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-Q

Summary: The Query for Current Context is only executed in active contexts?

Comment: The Query for Current Context is only executed in active contexts? Or passive context are also included?

(see also github issue https://github.com/HL7/fhircast-docs/issues/71)

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #142

isaacvetter commented on Issue #142:

Proposed resolution: Duplicate
Proposed resolution comment: Duplicate of #143. Resolved by removing query for current context. While this is a trivial resolution, because I think that @bvdh intended for this comment to be a more substantive comment per his reference to #71, #71 is also being resolved as persuasive by #156.
